newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean firms buy 30,100 tonnes of Thai tapioca.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean firms buy 30,100 tonnes of Thai tapioca.

text.p: A South Korean buyers' group, known as the "Big Feed Mills", bought a combined 30,100 tonnes of Thai tapioca from Haitai International Inc through a closed tender, an official of the buyers' group said on Tuesday.

The official said the purchase was split into two lots. The buyers' group bought 14,300 tonnes at $83.20 a tonne C&F with arrival by June 30 and the remaining 15,800 tonnes at $82.95 a tonne C&F with arrival by July 30.
Arrival was set for the two South Korean ports of Inchon and Kunsan.
